text: Coimbatore–Chennai Central Superfast express (Train Nos 12681/12682) is a weekly express train run by Indian Railways between Coimbatore city Junction and Chennai Central. ==Service== The train starts on Fridays from Coimbatore and on Saturdays from Chennai Central, covering the total distance of in approximately 8 hours. == Schedule == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Train Number !! Station Code !! Departure Station !! Departure Time !! Departure Day !! Arrival Station !! Arrival Time !! Arrival Day !! Chennai Central || 7:20 AM (Destination) || 497 || Day 2 |} ==Rake Sharing== The Coimbatore–Chennai Central express has rake sharing arrangement with the (Train No 12647/12648) Kongu Express. ==LOCO== The train is pulled by WAP-4 from Erode or Arakkonam. ==Coach Composition== The train has standard ICF rakes with max speed of 110 kmph. * 1 AC II Tier * 2 AC III Tier * 14 Sleeper Coaches * 3 General
